title: Which Upcoming Free Agent Combinations Fit Best? | Group Chat
description:
We briefly survey the NBA Finals as it stands, tied 1-1 (2:00), before diving into swirling rumors about Kyrie Irving to the Nets or Lakers, Anthony Davis to anyone who will open their wallet, D’Angelo Russell to a mid-level franchise, and more (34:00).

Hosts: Chris Ryan and Justin Verrier

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
